materials.raw_text:
Bismuth Oxide (Bi2O3) - 300 g 
 Cadmium Sulfide (CdS) - 50 g 
 Sulfur (S) - 40 g 
 Distilled Water - 200 mL

sourcing.instructions:
Bismuth Oxide - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich, Fisher Scientific) 
 Cadmium Sulfide - Specialty chemical suppliers or online platforms 
 Sulfur - Local hardware stores or chemical suppliers

1. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine 300 g of Bismuth Oxide and 50 g of Cadmium Sulfide.

preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine 300 g of Bismuth Oxide and 50 g of Cadmium Sulfide. 
 2. Gradually add 40 g of Sulfur to the mixture while stirring. 
 3. Slowly add 200 mL of distilled water to create a slurry. 
 4. Mix thoroughly until a uniform paste is formed.
